author: prickett
msg: Contributed by Mike George - Thanks Mike for your hard work!!!
Correction to the time zone schema to handle an unexpected case
New test to test that you can set/get valid encoding parameter values
Addition to the ParamTests to run the ValidEncodingParamTest.

author: prickett
msg: Fixed it so that "" or empty strings are interpreted as null values
by the Actions that process the event information.

author: prickett
msg: Added code to save the event to a database via a web browser witha a set of
Turbine actions.
Added a dependency on the servlet jar file.

author: prickett
msg: Added Recur ID Minute Param to the Velocity context in Evt_do_jrl.java
Removed HTML Header and Body tags from the Event_detail.vm template as they
are not needed when using Turbine.
Added a form element to enclose the input tags so that the input elements
would be rendered by the web browser.
Added a submit button to save the event information on the Event_detail.vm
template
Fixed the start minute value so that it would not render a value
if no value was present.
Fixed the url value so that it would not render a value if no value was present.
Fixed the start time time zone id parameter so that it would reflect the
value set in the Velocity Context
Fixed the start time time zone id parameter so that it would not render a value
if none was present.

author: prickett
msg: Added methods to the screens to add the parameter values to the
Velocity context used by Turbine.
Added a new file to hold the parameter values.
